import React from 'react' import './Intro.css' import bg from '../../Assets/GW.jpg' import btnImg from '../../Assets/hireme.png' import { Link } from 'react-scroll' import { useTypewriter } from 'react-simple-typewriter' const Intro = () => { const { sergio } = useTypewriter({ words: ['Sergio',], loop: {}, }) return (
hello, I'm Sergio
Website Designer

I am a skilled web designer with experience in creating
vissualy appealing and user friendly website

) } export default Intro
